mapper.sql: uuid, reportid, currmessage, premessage, dealperson, dealtime, dealmethod
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'false' as QUERYID,
from reprecord
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
insert into reprecord
reportid,
currmessage,
premessage,
dealperson,
dealtime,
dealmethod,
#{reportid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{currmessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{premessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dealperson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dealtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dealmethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update reprecord
reportid = #{reportid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
currmessage = #{currmessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
premessage = #{premessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dealperson = #{dealperson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dealtime = #{dealtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dealmethod = #{dealmethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update reprecord set reportid = #{reportid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, currmessage = #{currmessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, premessage = #{premessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dealperson = #{dealperson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dealtime = #{dealtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dealmethod = #{dealmethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select * from reprecord where reportid = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by dealtime desc
